# ForceEffectComponent.SimulationState

**Enumeration**

The simulation runtime states.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SimulationState
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **ForceEffectComponent.SimulationState.pause**: The simulation will pause.
- **ForceEffectComponent.SimulationState.resume**: The simulation will resume, if paused.
- **ForceEffectComponent.SimulationState.start**: The simulation will start, and its time set to zero. The simulation will restart if already started.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
